title: Reconnect button still shows after the game has ended.
body:
Basically I was in a game and our nexus had the animation of being destroyed so i alt f4'd to get out quicker. I was prompted with the reconnect button but normally it just disappears and the end game screen shows up. This time it doesn't and when i'm pressing it it has the error of "you have disconnected please check your internet connection etc" I tried to close the client or restart my computer but that reconnect button won't just disappear. And it shows that i'm in game.
edit: apparently whenever i reconnect the timer from "in game" resets

replies.body: This is sometimes considered a ghost time.  The match has ended, but the server failed to pick up the end of the match.  Relogging will usually fix this, otherwise just waiting it out a little bit should do the trick.  Let me know if that clears things up, and hang tight!
It cleared out the next day but thanks for explaining the situation.
I and four people I play with also have this problem.  Pls fix.
Same here gents, looks likea ghost game  bug.
